Open Thanksgiving Day from 11am to 3pm (must be seated by 3pm) http://www.organicgar...

SIGN UP AND CALL TO MAKE A RESERVATION CALL 978/922-0004.

In the true spirit of this holiday season, we are offering a limited menu* on a sliding scale on Thanksgiving, Thursday November 24th.

* sliding scale is available on the following: Thanksgiving Dinner, Salads and Bowls Pay from $0 to full price, or by paying more you can take this opportunity to "Pay it Forward" for others in need of an inspirational meal! See full details on the dinner.  http://organicgardencafe.com/thanksgiving_meal.php

In the spirit of this special day, we also will have a community table for those who wish to make new friends and share glad tidings! So make a reservation & let others know you are coming!

Our gourmet raw meal will feature the UN-Turkey you've come to love with Pecan Mushroom Gravy, Cranberry Relish & sides. We'll also make sure to have plenty of butternut squash on hand for soups and Harvest Bowls. In order to facilitate a large crowd, this day will NOT offer table service or a juice bar. Come and be part of a joyous event and history in the making! Our normal menu prices are already the best deal in organic & raw cuisine and there is no pressure for you to pay more or less than the standard price.

Consider this day to be one of the early seedlings of a new paradigm for business enterprise, 'Pay-It-Forward Commerce'. You get the opportunity to be on either side of the equation, if you choose so, (or right in the middle); as it is good to receive and it is good to give. Thanks for making our last Pay-it-forward New Year's Weekend a success!

May the LIFE FORCE reside in you,

May you embody the true spirit of this holiday of gratitude and generosity

Rawbert and the Amazing OG TEAM
